system.description:
The giant has 3 mutations from the following list (roll [[/r 2d6]]),

1. Thick hide: +3 AC,

2. 2d10 additional eyes (can't be surprised),

3. Wings: gains MV near (fly) ,

4. Tentacles: gains extra ATK tentacles +9 (2d10) ,

5. Scythe-hands: increase claws to +10 (2d12) ,

6. Mage resistant: immune to tier 1-3 spells ,

7. Ravenous: gains extra bite ATK, bite +9 (2d10) ,

8. Bite: DC 15 STR, DEX, CON, or INT ,

9. Leader: +4 CHA,

10. Enchanted: only harmed by magical sources,

11. Unholy: Lawful and Neutral priests within far, DISADV on spellcasting checks,
